NAME: Pradeep Chittemsetty
ABOUT:
Provide advisory services on process improvement initiatives based on International process excellence frameworks such as Lean Six Sigma, CMMI-DEV, CMMI-SVC, ISO 9001, ISO 20000 and ITIL to achieve measurement objective and Business Objectives to bring lasting value to organization.

Closely work with the organizations and provide services that includes review of quality management system (QMS) to identify the gaps and areas of improvement, provide model based overview trainings, facilitate to develop QMS with appropriate metrics, data collection mechanism and metrics analysis using various methods and tools, perform implementation reviews to ensure the correctness and implementation effectiveness of the defined processes across projects. 

Provide advisory services and facilitated many organizations based on Lean Six Sigma, CMMI ML3 and ML5
